title: Online alert for skins in sale

embed.title: LoL Skin Alert | CaptainLoL
embed.description: Which League of Legends skins are in sale? Set your LoL skin alert. Get an Email with the skins in Sale you ever wanted! Set your LoL skin alert now!

body:
Hi guys,

I found a tool where you can get an email when your favourite skins are in sale. Like an alert. Simple but quiet useful.
Thought maybe someone needs something like this. {{summoner:14}} 

Cheers,
Aras
